## Source: ossf-package-analysis (2779c32d64a46ff3b8b9de62cd9161c7b6e0071c4a3103b2a37e949f374467a0)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'dva-loading-show-rce' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
